string-array.name: alarm_set
string-array.item: This alarm is set for less than 1 minute from now.
This alarm is set for %1$s from now.
This alarm is set for %2$s from now.
This alarm is set for %1$s and %2$s from now.
This alarm is set for %3$s from now.
This alarm is set for %1$s and %3$s from now.
This alarm is set for %2$s and %3$s from now.
This alarm is set for %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s from now.

string-array.name: alarm_shutdown_set
string-array.item: This shutdown is set for less than 1 minute from now.
This shutdown is set for %1$s from now.
This shutdown is set for %2$s from now.
This shutdown is set for %1$s and %2$s from now.
This shutdown is set for %3$s from now.
This shutdown is set for %1$s and %3$s from now.
This shutdown is set for %2$s and %3$s from now.
This shutdown is set for %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s from now.

string-array.name: alarm_startup_set
string-array.item: This startup is set for less than 1 minute from now.
This startup is set for %1$s from now.
This startup is set for %2$s from now.
This startup is set for %1$s and %2$s from now.
This startup is set for %3$s from now.

This startup is set for %2$s and %3$s from now.
This startup is set for %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s from now.
